analysis_summary: Bearish market with high volatility and extreme fear sentiment. BNB and SOL positions are held due to strong Qlib scores and favorable funding rates, but no new positions are opened to limit risk in current conditions.

actions.entry_reason: Qlib Rank #1, low RSI, positive funding rate supports long bias.

exit_plan.invalidation: Funding rate exceeds 0.03% or RSI drops below 25

actions.entry_reason: Qlib Rank #2, negative funding rate indicates short squeeze potential, RSI oversold.

exit_plan.invalidation: Funding rate flips positive > 0.01% or OI increases significantly
